column1: The teacher explains everything very clearly
Sometimes i feel rushed in class
I wish there were more revision sessions
I learn best when there are visual aid
Practice sheets provided are really helpful
Class is fun and interactive and i love group activities
I  really enjoy the way teacher uses examples
i wish the teacher explains more in detail
the teacher is really kind and helpful
I find  difficulty in understanding concepts because of the fast pace
I wish there were more practical classes
theory can be boring at times
I feel a lot of time is wasted in managing the students during class
I wish there were more classes so to avoid last minute syllabus cover up
